section.title: Apache Forrest - FOAF Plugin
section.p: Renders a and aggregates FOAF documents into human readable form.

section.title: Samples
section.p: This section includes links to a number of samples using this plugin. The plugin is intended to be self documenting through these samples. If you require further help please ask on the user mailing list.

section.title: FOAF index
section.p: This plugin can also be used to aggregate FOAF documents from various sources. To index and view FOAF documents using this plugin, add the URIs of the FOAF documents in samples/foafIndex.xml. Since the FOAF data can be obtained from anywhere you want, the FOAF data is assured to be kept up to date.
Add an "id" for the person and the locaction of that person's FOAF file as shown below. The "id" will be used in indexing the FOAF data.

section.title: Linking FOAF files
section.p: Tools such as the PingTheSemanticWeb web service (which collects notifications about presence or updates to RDF data on the web), and Semantic Radar extension for Firefox (which lets users to discover RDF data on web pages while browsing), will be able to find the FOAF data associated with the website generated by this plugin.
